laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity and contour. No focal liver lesion is seen. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilation is identified. The CBD measures 3 mm. The gallbladder is moderately distended and contains several mobile stones. No wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid is seen. Sonographic Murphy sign was positive. No free fluid is seen. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow.
